headline: CarMax (KMX) Is Down 15.7% After Leadership Overhaul and Legal Challenges - Has the Narrative Shifted?
summary: CarMax, Inc. recently announced a significant leadership overhaul, including the removal of CEO Bill Nash, appointment of David McCreight as interim CEO, and concurrent board restructuring amid the release of disappointing quarterly guidance and ongoing securities class action lawsuits. These developments have raised questions about leadership stability, operational execution, and the sustainability of CarMax's previous growth, as the company now addresses both legal and business challenges...
